Name: Celestial
About the game: Celestial is an open-world space survival game playing on a spherical planet. It's the year 2542 and you play in the role of an Astronaut who is tasked with testing the first Warp drive created by Humankind, but after a chain of events, you end up getting sucked into a black hole and teleported to an unknown part of the universe. Now it is up to you to survive against various roaming alien creaturs, encounter a dangerous environment with sand storms, hurling tornados, and radioactive clouds. Key features. - Spherical world of 700km2. (still in development.) The Planet is Currently still in development and I will add more new Continents with new biomes in the future. - Variety of roaming Ai some of which are machines and other alien creatures. . Currently, there are 6 different hostile Ai roaming the planet each with different kinds of abilities. more to come in the future! - Hostile environment. the planet comes with several different dangers like sand storms, tornados, radioactive clouds and a toxic atmosphere with no breathable air. - Gather resources to build up your base. Currently, there are 8 gatherable resources like fruits, ores, and corpses, and over 10 craftable resources that can be used to build useful machines and base parts. -Ancient Ruins Explore ancient ruins and reactivate the technologies found within to one day find a way back home by learning and using the alien machines.
